name: Internet Time
author: ViniRoger

sections.description:
Shows time in HH:MM and Internet time @ relative to server time at the moment the user views the page

É possível seugerir modificações e idéias para este plugin?

Claro que pode, para isso acesse o link http://www.monolitonimbus.com.br/contato/
sections.installation: Copy the directory internet-time to …/wp-content/plugins and activate on WordPress panel
sections.changelog:
1.0

Still without new versions

1.1

Two digits to show hour and minutes
